item.title: About me
item.description:
My name is Augustine Dunn (Gus). I am currently a Postdoctoral Associate in the Ecology and Evolutionary Biology Department at Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut USA.

I specialize in analyzing biological data using computational approaches, especially high-throughput sequencing data including RNA-seq and ddRAD-seq. This site is still being developed.

If you would like to contact me or read more, check out the contact buttons near the top and bottom of the page!

Gus
